name: Autók
query: SELECT `car`.`id`, `car`.`name`, `car`.`nameID`,`car`.`year`, `car`.`colorID`,`color`.`name`, `car`.`engine`, `car`.`fuelID`,`fuel`.`name`, `car`.`horsepower`, `car`.`torque`, `car`.`acceleration`, `car`.`topspeed`, `car`.`price`, `car`.`manufactured`, `car`.`km` FROM `car` INNER JOIN `color` ON `car`.`colorID` = `color`.`id` INNER JOIN `fuel` ON `car`.`fuelID` = `fuel`.`id` WHERE `car`.`valid` = 1 ORDER BY `car`.`id`;
